did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Consists of personal and family documents; materials relating to organizations with which Hay was professionally involved; and reference files concerning employee rating and testing.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Edward Northrup Hay was a management consultant, engineer, and personnel director; publisher and editor of the PERSONNEL JOURNAL; and founder and president of Hay and Associates, a management consultant firm. Hay also developed executive aptitude tests which he marketed through the Aptitude Test Service.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Consists of personal and family documents; materials relating to organizations with which Hay was professionally involved; and reference files concerning employee rating and testing.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Edward Northup Hay Papers #5227. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
